[File: aptos-core/execution/executor/src/chunk_executor/chunk_commit_queue.rs] [Struct: ChunkCommitQueue] [Arc reference cycles] Can Arc cloning of chunk_verifier or transaction_accumulator create reference cycles preventing proper cleanup and causing memory leaks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor/src/chunk_executor/chunk_commit_queue.rs] [Function: enqueue_for_ledger_update()] [Clone performance] Does cloning result_state() for every enqueue cause performance issues with large state objects, enabling validator slowdown attacks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor/src/chunk_executor/chunk_commit_queue.rs] [Function: save_ledger_update_output()] [Checkpoint bypass] If ensure_state_checkpoint_output() can be satisfied without actual Merkle tree checkpoint, can invalid state summaries be committed? (High)

[File: aptos-core/execution/executor/src/chunk_executor/chunk_commit_queue.rs] [Struct: ChunkCommitQueue] [Validator collusion] Can colluding validators (< 1/3 Byzantine) manipulate their local ChunkCommitQueues to commit different state summaries while staying within Byzantine threshold? (High)
